p: The relative weight of the liver recorded in quails treated with oil whatever the dose was comparable ( P > 0.05) to that of the quails in the control group. However, this weight tends to decrease with 100 and 150 μl/kg bw compared to the weight of liver recorded in the control group and quails fed on the smallest dose of the essential oil (50 μl/kg of bw) ( Table 3).
